title: No img element
content: Prevent usage of element due to slower LCP and higher bandwidth. An element was used to display an image instead of from next/image. Note: If deploying to a managed hosting provider, remember to check provider pricing since optimized images might be charged differently than the original images. Common image optimization platform pricing: Note: If self-hosting, remember to install sharp and check if your server has enough storage to cache the optimized images.
